Gabriel de Souza Alves

🚀 Hello! How are you? 🪐

🌌 I am a very curious person and I love learning, as a good lifelong learner 🧑‍🔬.
In my projects, I seek to combine everything I enjoy doing, for example:
- programming embedded systems and distributed web applications.
- electronics and mechanical projects.

I use my car as a study platform for my learning process in mechanics, performing its maintenance and enhancements.

I really enjoy 3D printing and modeling. I volunteer to maintain the 3D printers at FabLab Bauru.

📜 Studies 🧑‍🎓

Electronics Technician from ETEC Jorge Street.

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from UNESP Bauru.

👩🏽‍🚀 Projects 🤖

As my college thesis, a telemetry system for FEB Racing.

I am doing 3D printing, learning everything from scratch, including printer maintenance, and I have already been able to print with ABS and PLA.

🏆 Accomplishments 🏅

I disassembled and assembled the engine of a Corsa Wind 8v 4-door hatchback without air conditioning or power steering with the help of many colleagues. It was incredible. In addition to this adventure, I have done several other maintenance tasks on it, and more are being done.

I am doing maintenance on the printers at the FabLab of Unesp Bauru and learning laser cutting with the people there.

The best way out is always through
-Robert Frost

💻 Work History 👨‍💻

CoteFacil

Jan 2022 - May 2023

Python Development/DevOps

- Back-end development of distributed Python applications that access API data and Web Scraping(integrations)
- Maintance of Java API's
- Using Graylog as a monitoring tool and troubleshooting
- DevOps - CICD and software quality pipeline creation (GitLab and GitHub)
- Using Docker to distribute the applications
- Refactor big projects to a good software architecture and design, using reverse engineering, to keep the necessary code behavior, simplifying as much as possible the code base, to have a better maintenance and feature creation
- Optimization of data processing (5~7min to 1min)
- Discovery of technologies that the team has no experience and applying it to the team development cycle
- Knowledge spread of the technologies discovered
Skills: Python · Java · AWS DevOps · Docker · Graylog · Bash · Linux · Virtual Machines · Agile Team · Code Refactoring · Software Design and Engineering · Reverse Engineering · Relational and Non Relational Databases · Microservices · Serverless · Integrations · Web Scraping · CI/CD pipelines
